Docs.summary: This is the main client class for interacting with the Azure SQL Database REST APIs.

Docs.param: Reference to the Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Management.Sql.IDacOperations.
Required. The name of the Azure SQL Database Server in which the database to export resides.

Docs.summary: Exports an Azure SQL Database into a DACPAC file in Azure Blob Storage.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Management.Sql.Models.DacGetStatusResponse GetStatus (this Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Management.Sql.IDacOperations operations, string serverName, string fullyQualifiedServerName, string username, string password, string requestId);

.method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Management.Sql.Models.DacGetStatusResponse GetStatus(class Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Management.Sql.IDacOperations operations, string serverName, string fullyQualifiedServerName, string username, string password, string requestId) cil managed

Docs.param: Reference to the Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Management.Sql.IDacOperations.
Required. The name of the server in which the import or export operation is taking place.
Required. The fully qualified domain name of the Azure SQL Database Server where the operation is taking place. Example: a9s7f7s9d3.database.windows.net
Required. The administrator username for the Azure SQL Database Server.
Required. The administrator password for the Azure SQL Database Server.
Required. The request ID of the operation being queried. The request ID is obtained from the responses of the import and export operations.
Docs.summary: Gets the status of the import or export operation in the specified server with the corresponding request ID. The request ID is provided in the responses of the import or export operation.
Docs.returns: Represents a list of import or export status values returned from GetStatus.
